import React from 'react' import Grid from "./Grid" import logo from "../assets/images/Logo-2.png" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" const footerAboutLinks = [ { display: 'Gioi thieu', path: '/about' }, { display: 'Lien he', path: '/about' }, { display: 'Tuyen dung', path: '/about' }, { display: 'Tin tuc', path: '/about' }, { display: 'He thong cua hang', path: '/about' } ] const footerCustomerLinks = [ { display: 'Chinh sach doi tra', path: '/about' }, { display: 'Chinh sach bao hanh', path: '/about' }, { display: 'Chinh sach hoan tien', path: '/about' }, ] const Footer = () => { return (

) } export default Footer
